{{cpp/experimental/fs/title|is_empty}}
{{cpp/experimental/fs/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|experimental/filesystem}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=fs_ts|1=
bool is_empty( const path&amp; p );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=fs_ts|1=
bool is_empty( const path&amp; p, error_code&amp; ec );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Checks whether the given path refers to an empty file or directory.

The second version returns {{c|false}} and sets {{c|ec}} to an appropriate error code if an error occurs. Otherwise, {{c|ec}} is cleared with a call to {{c|ec.clear()}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|p|path to examine}}
{{par|ec|error code to modify in case of error}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if {{c|p}} refers to an empty file or directory, {{c|false}} otherwise.

===Exceptions===
@1@ {{c|filesystem_error}} if an error occurs. The exception object is constructed with {{c|p}} as an argument. The error code is set to an appropriate error code for the error that caused the failure.

@2@ {{unreviewed noexcept}}
